name: Gloomy Island
description:
Gloomy Island - the game is a mixture of an adventure game and classic quests. Early in the morning you wake up and receive a letter from a mysterious stranger. The letter contained an address with coordinates unknown to you and a request to find important documents. You immediately pack your things and go there!

Arriving at the place, you find out that this is an abandoned island and there has been no one here for a long time. Your task is to unravel the secrets of this place and collect all the necessary documents. Explore various locations, solve complex puzzles to advance further in the plot. Be very careful and don't miss hints that can help you! Whether you can find all the documents and return home is up to you!

Peculiarities:
- Varied and interesting puzzles.
- Black and white visual style.
- Great soundtrack.
- Embark on an exciting journey and see where it takes you!
